modName: Kynesguard and Daedra Hunter Weapons and Armor
summary: Follow the trail of a heroic knight, claiming his weapons and armor along the way, and discover the hideout of a Daedra Hunter to claim his stash!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#AFDCEC][size=5]Follow me on Twitter ([url=https://twitter.com/nujakujata]@nujakujata[/url])! If I get over 1k followers from this community, I'll create a Reinforced Chinese Stealth Suit mod for Fallout 4![/size]

Kynesguard and Daedra Hunter Weapons & Armor[/color]
Author: Mars (aka Gaijune)
My Portfolio: marsashton.net
My Blog: marsashton.blogspot.com

Description
===============
Follow the trail of a heroic knight by searching for his lost journals throughout Skyrim, claiming his weapons and armor along the way. You can begin this quest by discovering the Buried Tower located South/Southwest of Riften. Upon completion of this quest, you will come across a variety of one-handed and two-handed weapons. In addition, the entire Kynesguard armor set will be given to you, but not without clearing some of the vanilla game's most interesting dungeons.

Also, you can discover the abandoned hideout of a mysterious Daedra Hunter, slay the Dremora that guard his treasure, and claim your stealth/archery-focused bounty. The hideout is found near Ysgramor's Tomb.

Note:
- The armor is male only
- The Temple can be a player home, hence the exit


Install
===============
1. Drag the included Data folder over to "(Program Files)\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim"
2. Ensure the associated .esp is checked.
3. Play!

Uninstall
===============
1. Delete the "Kynesguard" BSA/ESP file in "(Program Files)\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim/data/"

Item Location/Information (Spoilers)
===============

Adding the item via console:
- Hit the '~' key during the game
- Type "help evenaar" without the quotes, or "help laasfeim", et cetera
- A list of IDs should appear. Use Page Up/Down to scroll. Note the 8-digit ID code next to the desired item's line
- Type "player.additem your8digitcodehere 1" without the quotes, replacing 'your8digitcodehere' with the code, and replacing the '1' if necessary if you want more than one of the item added to your inventory

Daedra Hunter Hood
ID: XX011DF9
Location: Abandoned Hideout (inside Daedra Hunter Cache treasure chest)
Description: A red hood that boosts your critical hit chance with bows.

Daedra Hunter Armor
ID: XX01188B
Location: Abandoned Hideout (inside Daedra Hunter Cache treasure chest)
Description: A belted, texture-modified nightingale armor with assymetrical shoulder plating. Improves stamina and carry weight.

Dark Daedra Hunter Armor
ID: XX0190BC
Location: Crafted with the Ebony/Arcane perk...
1x Regular Daedra Hunter Armor
1x Ebony Ingot
Description: A belted, texture-modified nightingale armor with assymetrical shoulder plating. Improves stamina and carry weight.

Daedra Hunter Boots
ID: XX011DEF
Location: Abandoned Hideout (inside Daedra Hunter Cache treasure chest)
Description: Ebony-plated boots that reduce Power Attack costs and improve sneakiness.

Daedra Hunter Gauntlets
ID: XX011DF7
Location: Abandoned Hideout (inside Daedra Hunter Cache treasure chest)
Description: Assymetrical ebony-plated nightingale gloves that improves your efficiency with bows and increases your unarmed damage.

Kynesguard Helm
ID: XX001007
Location: Shroud Hearth Barrow (near the 'boss' inside Abandoned treasure chest)
Description: Reinforced white Ebony helm that improves persuasive skills and increases damage with bows.

Kynesguard Hauberk
ID: XX001001 (normal)
ID: XX017475 (No shoulder plating)
ID: XX017473 (No shoulder plating on the left)
ID: XX017474 (No shoulder plating on the right)
Location: Rannveig's Fast (inside Abandoned treasure chest near Dragon Wall)
Description: Reinforced white Ebony Mail/Armor that increases health/stamina regeneration and reduces incoming magicka damage. The normal version can be smithed into variations with/without the shoulder plating. Note: Smithing the variants requires the Ebony Smithing perk.

Kynesguard Greaves
ID: XX001009
Location: Ragnvald (near the 'boss' inside Abandoned treasure chest)
Description: Modified white Ebony Boots that increase carry weight and reduce the cost of Power Attacks.

Kynesguard Gauntlets
ID: XX001008
Location: Hidden Temple (on a pedestal in front of the giant statue in the main hall)
Description: Modified white Ebony gloves the resist disease and grant the ability to cast Kyne's Touch, a cheap heal spell with a fixed cost.

Kynesguard Buckler
ID: XX002042
Location: Ragnvald (near the 'boss' inside Abandoned treasure chest)
Description: Modified 'sideways' white Ebony Shield that improves blocking efficiency and increases unarmed damage.

Zeal
ID: XX004B69
Location: Hidden Temple (on a pedestal in front of the giant statue in the main hall)
Description: Modified Ebony Sword/Dawnbreaker, one-handed, that deals a small amount of armor-ignoring damage.

Balthasar
ID: XX004B69
Location: Requires Zeal and Arcane Smithing to Craft
Description: Modified Ebony Sword/Dawnbreaker, two-handed, that deals a small amount of armor-ignoring damage.

Hero's Greatsword
ID: XX00100C
Location: Hidden Temple (near the forge on the second level)
Description: Modified iron claymore/steel sword, two-handed, complete with a sweet sheath.

Vahlokzun, Guardian Sword
ID: XX004601
Location: Shroud Hearth Barrow (near the 'boss', thrust into a table)
Description: Modified silver greatsword/rueful axe, two-handed, that releases a health regenerating Guardian Circle when you land critical hits. Flashy.

Alundwiin, Immortal Blade
ID: XX00E9D4
Location: Ragnvald (next to one of the skull keys)
Description: Modified ancient nord greatsword/sword, two-handed, that drains Magicka and releases a blast of blue energy upon critical hits.

Laasfeim, Life Faded
ID: XX010DC2
Location: Ragnvald (next to one of the skull keys)
Description: Modified ancient nord sword/axe, one-handed, that drains Magicka and releases a blast of blue energy upon critical hits.

Evenaar, Alduin's Bane
ID: XX007BE3
Location: Crafted with the Arcane Smithing Perk and...
10xDragon Scale
10xDragon Bone
3xEbony Ingot
3xEctoplasm
1xDaedric Greatsword
Description: Colossal greatsword made from Alduin's Flesh. Deals fire/ice/lightning damage.

History
===============
v1.0 - Initial Release
v1.1 - Fixed a few bugs, added beast-friendly variants for the hood/helm, added recipe for Evenaar/Balthasar
V1.2 - Fixed a few bugs, made the temple more home-friendly, added Dark Daedra Hunter Armor item, added missing upgrade recipes
